sprint_goal: Establish foundational monorepo and all core AWS infrastructure via Terraform.
key_deliverables: Initialized FE/BE repos; Deployed VPC, RDS, ECS Cluster, Lambda, Cognito, and API Gateway via Terraform.
demo_objectives: Showcase created AWS resources from Terraform code. Demonstrate local FE and BE app startup.
success_criteria: All infrastructure provisioned successfully; Repos are set up with initial tooling.
risk_factors: RISK-003: Delays in setting up foundational infrastructure.
mitigation_strategies: Assign dedicated DevOps resources; Prioritize minimum viable infrastructure first.
burndown_target: Complete all IaC tasks for core services.

sprint_goal: Implement the full CI/CD pipeline and the complete user registration flow.
epic_coverage: Project Scaffolding & Foundational Infrastructure, User Authentication & Account Management
key_deliverables: Automated CI/CD pipeline with test, scan, and deploy stages; User registration UI and backend logic.
demo_objectives: Show CI/CD pipeline triggering on a push and deploying to staging; Demonstrate a new user successfully creating an account.
success_criteria: Pipeline successfully deploys a build to staging; User registration is fully functional.
risk_factors: RISK-003: Pipeline delays; RISK-005: Security scan false positives.
mitigation_strategies: Iterate on pipeline features; Start security scans in audit-only mode.
burndown_target: Complete pipeline automation and registration feature.

sprint_goal: Deliver the user login flow and core calculator functionality, including basic arithmetic, angle modes, and SI prefix input.
epic_coverage: User Authentication & Account Management, Core Scientific Calculator Module
key_deliverables: Fully functional user login with PKCE; Core calculator UI with basic arithmetic, trig functions, and SI prefix support.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a user logging in; Perform calculations using scientific functions and SI prefixes.
success_criteria: Login flow is secure and functional; Core calculator passes all calculation test cases.
risk_factors: RISK-006: Skill gaps in expression parsing.
mitigation_strategies: Pair programming on the parser; leverage a well-vetted third-party library.
burndown_target: Complete login and core calculator features.

sprint_goal: Implement data persistence, account deletion, and specialized electronics modes.
epic_coverage: User Authentication & Account Management, User-Extensible Custom Modes, Specialized Electronics Modes, Core Scientific Calculator Module
key_deliverables: Backend APIs for variables, history, and custom modes; Account Deletion flow; All specialized electronics calculators; Custom Mode creation wizard.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate creating a variable and seeing it persist; Use the Ohm's Law calculator; Start creating a custom mode; Securely delete a user account.
success_criteria: All data persistence APIs are functional; Electronics modes are correct and usable.
risk_factors: Data integrity for account deletion; Complexity of dynamic forms in custom mode wizard.
mitigation_strategies: Use database transactions for deletion; Thorough component testing for wizard.
integration_windows: Frontend-Backend integration for all persistence features.

sprint_goal: Launch custom modes, deliver offline sync, and complete compliance tasks.
epic_coverage: User-Extensible Custom Modes, Offline Capability & Data Synchronization, Quality, Compliance, and Operations
key_deliverables: Secure custom formula execution engine; Full offline data synchronization with conflict resolution; WCAG 2.1 AA compliance; In-app help system.
demo_objectives: Create and execute a custom mode; Demonstrate making changes while offline and syncing upon reconnection; Showcase accessibility features with a screen reader.
success_criteria: Custom mode execution is secure and functional; Offline sync works without data loss; Application passes WCAG 2.1 AA audit.
risk_factors: RISK-001: Sandbox security vulnerability; RISK-002: Data corruption from sync logic; RISK-004: Failure to meet accessibility standards.
mitigation_strategies: Rigorous security code reviews; Extensive E2E testing for offline sync; Continuous automated and manual accessibility testing.
